text: Tulayl ash-Sham () is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. It is located on the Queiq Plain, northeast of Azaz, north of the city of Aleppo, and less than east of the border with the Turkish province of Kilis. The village administratively belongs to Nahiya Azaz in Azaz District. Nearby localities include Shamarikh to the southeast and Shamarin to the northeast. In the 2004 census, Tulayl ash-Sham had a population of 176. ==References==
title: Tulayl ash-Sham
